channel.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
channel.description:
Well, uhmm, This is my first time making .GIF formatted images, I used Photoshop CS5 extended, I've just done a simple design, and I haven't included a background. I will do that on my second try. Constructive criticism, Thanks. Supportive comments that help me improve is encouraged.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/66anvc.jpg[/img]
IMPROVED, V2: [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2irxjy0.gif[/img]
For the lolz:
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/zilips.gif[/img] -[b] I did this for fun because I was bored. The basket was too hard for me [/b]to draw. Sorry..

item.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

[quote]Constructive criticism, Thanks. Supportive comments that help me improve is encouraged.

Sorry, but I wasn’t poorly criticizing him because he was asking us to judge the animation but there was nothing about the animation to judge. All it was were pictures appearing one after another. What was there ti judge?

Sorry b00mz but, please read or don’t post
Telling me how to improve it helps.[/quote]

I was informing you there was nothing to criticize. For that your welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Constructive criticism, Thanks. Supportive comments that help me improve is encouraged.
b00mz1029:

Sorry, but I wasn’t poorly criticizing him because he was asking us to judge the animation but there was nothing about the animation to judge. All it was were pictures appearing one after another. What was there ti judge?

Sorry b00mz but, please read or don’t post
Telling me how to improve it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:8, topic:528262”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=647009.msg4351673#msg4351673 date=1376763114]

There isn’t much to criticize because it’s the most basic gif you could do. There is nothing that has to be smooth, or timed out or anything.

do not criticize someone if you are going to do so in an extremely biased way. i don’t understand how you can describe this as being ‘the most basic GIF you could do’, because there is no factual evidence of this, which means it is opinionated. i understand criticism comes from a biased point of view, but you need to have a reasonable platform from which these opinions are coming from.

i do agree that the timing and overall smoothness could be much better.

That comment was written whenever he had only released one piece of work.
[/quote]
that doesn’t matter. you were still poorly criticizing it.[/quote]

Sorry, but I wasn’t poorly criticizing him because he was asking us to judge the animation but there was nothing about the animation to judge. All it was were pictures appearing one after another. What was there ti judge?

Read full topic

item.description:

There isn’t much to criticize because it’s the most basic gif you could do. There is nothing that has to be smooth, or timed out or anything.

do not criticize someone if you are going to do so in an extremely biased way. i don’t understand how you can describe this as being ‘the most basic GIF you could do’, because there is no factual evidence of this, which means it is opinionated. i understand criticism comes from a biased point of view, but you need to have a reasonable platform from which these opinions are coming from.

i do agree that the timing and overall smoothness could be much better.
[/quote]

That comment was written whenever he had only released one piece of work.[/quote]
that doesn’t matter. you were still poorly criticizing it.

Read full topic

do not criticize someone if you are going to do so in an extremely biased way. i don’t understand how you can describe this as being ‘the most basic GIF you could do’, because there is no factual evidence of this, which means it is opinionated. i understand criticism comes from a biased point of view, but you need to have a reasonable platform from which these opinions are coming from.

item.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

b00mz1029:

There isn’t much to criticize because it’s the most basic gif you could do. There is nothing that has to be smooth, or timed out or anything.

do not criticize someone if you are going to do so in an extremely biased way. i don’t understand how you can describe this as being ‘the most basic GIF you could do’, because there is no factual evidence of this, which means it is opinionated. i understand criticism comes from a biased point of view, but you need to have a reasonable platform from which these opinions are coming from.

i do agree that the timing and overall smoothness could be much better.

Read full topic

item.title: My GIF images [IMPROVED]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

*updated. Tell me what you think

V2 is much too choppy with the fade effect. The increments you changed the opacity by was too high. Try just changing them both by 10% everytime next time. This will give you a much smoother effect

Read full topic
